summary:
A geologist with 15 years of experience in oil and gas industry. Currently working as reservoir geology specialist (geomodeller) in one recognized oil and gas operator in the Netherlands. Has a good experience in geological modeling for carbonate reservoir also in clastic reservoir. Expert in one of modeling application available in the market.

Specialties: Geology
3D Static Modeling
Geostatistics
Petrel Seismic to Simulation
Field Development
Fracture Modelling
